member_organisations: Banana Growers Association, Belize is not affiliated with other organizations, national or international.
head_office_address: Banana Growers Association Savannah South Stann Creek
eu_initiatives:
BAM (Banana Accompanying Measures) 2013  
Productivity enhancement of the banana farms through integrated soil fertility management in the Banana Belt area of Belize. 
Programme is managed by IICA.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Banana Growers Association, Belize is purchasing and exporting the banana production from banana growers in Belize. The fruit is exported to the UK, purchased by Fyffes PLC
